DESC: Shows lyrics for the currently playing song.
METHOD_DESC_1: Shows lyrics for the provided song.
METHOD_DESC_2: Helps searching the Lyrics for the song.
MISSING_SONGTITLE: A song-title is required in this case.
NO_PLAYER: The bot is currently not playing.
ERROR: Something went wrong searching the lyrics.
NO_LYRICS_FOUND: We are sorry. Unfortunatley we did not found any lyrics. Try again with the <song-title> option.
